Name: Michael Hasek-Davion
Details:
Born 2985.

The current Duke of New Syrtis and Field Marshal of the Capellan March, Michael Hasek-Davion is one of the major power players in the Federated Suns. This has led to a number of clashes between him and the current First Prince, Hanse Davion, as Hasek-Davion is rumored to have ambitions to the throne after marrying Hanse's sister and becoming a part of the Davion line of succession.
